How can I list all currencies in Verus using the command line?

You can list all currencies in Verus using the `listcurrencies` command with the `true` parameter, like so:
```
> verus listcurrencies true
```
Alternatively, you can use `curl` to send a JSON-RPC request to the Verus daemon:
```bash
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listcurrencies", "params": [true] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```
